data.comment: The match has started at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Matthieu Udol (Metz) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 5, Free kick Lille.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Lille.
In the minute 7, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Lille.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Jeremie Pignard awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Metz.
Metz have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
In the minute 14, Dylan Bronn (Metz) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Lille are whistled for offside.
In Lille Lille drive forward through Jonathan David. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 17, In Lille, Metz push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille's Domagoj Bradaric is on target but unsuccessful.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Lille in the half of Metz.
At Stade Pierre Mauroy, Habib Maiga has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Lille's Jonathan Bamba misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Metz at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Metz push upfield but Jeremie Pignard quickly pulls them for offside.
Metz are pushing forward but Ibrahima Niane's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ibrahima Niane (Metz) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz are coming forward and Habib Maiga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Jeremie Pignard awards Lille a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Jeremie Pignard signals a Lille throw-in in Metz's half.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 31, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jeremy Pied (Lille) has received a yellow card from Jeremie Pignard.
Throw-in for Metz at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Lille in their own half.
Lille to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Lille needs to be cautious. Metz have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 36, Free kick Lille.
Metz's Dylan Bronn has been booked in Lille.
Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Play has been interrupted briefly in Lille to check on Alexandre Oukidja, who is grimacing with pain.
Metz's Alexandre Oukidja is back in action after a slight knock.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in high up the field for Metz in Lille.
Ball safe as Metz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Metz.
Vincent Pajot for Metz has been booked by Jeremie Pignard and receives a first yellow card.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Lille's Jonathan Ikone breaks free at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lille.
Jeremie Pignard will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Metz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Burak Yilmaz of Lille gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 46, Metz have a goal kick.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 48, Jose Fonte (Lille) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Metz defenders.
Jeremie Pignard signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Metz's area.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Lille, Jonathan Bamba of Lille is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 53, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Metz.
Metz to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Metz close to the penalty box.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Metz.
In the minute 57, Lille push forward at Stade Pierre Mauroy and Jonathan Ikone gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Metz defence.
Domagoj Bradaric (Lille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Lille's Jonathan Bamba gets in a shot on goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 61, Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Metz's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Lille in Lille.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 62, Can Metz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ibrahima Niane for Metz who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jeremie Pignard awards Lille a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Ibrahima Niane has recovered and rejoins the match in Lille.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 67, Lille drive upfield and Jose Fonte gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Metz defender.
Habib Diallo (Metz) has replaced the possibly injured Ibrahima Niane at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Lille's Jonathan Ikone gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Metz defender.
Throw-in Metz.
In the minute 73, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Metz in their own half.
In the minute 73, Jeremie Pignard signals a Metz throw-in in Lille's half.
Lille make their first substitution with Luiz Araujo replacing Jonathan Ikone.
Goal kick for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Throw-in for Metz in the half of Lille.
In the minute 75, Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Fabien Centtonze (Metz) has received a yellow card from Jeremie Pignard.
Free kick for Metz in the half of Lille.
In the minute 76, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Lille Lille attack through Luiz Araujo. The finish is off target, however.
Metz have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Metz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Free kick Lille.
In the minute 80, Jose Fonte (Lille) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Metz in their own half.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Lille.
In the minute 82, Burak Yilmaz of Lille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
Throw-in for Metz in their own half.
In the minute 83, Christophe Galtier is making the team's second substitution at Stade Pierre Mauroy with Zeki Celik replacing Jeremy Pied.
The home team replace Jonathan David with Tim Weah.
Lille's Zeki Celik has been booked in Lille.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Metz goal kick.
Lille to take a throw-in in Metz territory.
Yusuf Yazici is replacing Benjamin Andre for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Lille close to the penalty box.
Goal! Luiz Araujo gives Lille a 1-0 lead.
Domagoj Bradaric with an assist there.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
Jeremie Pignard awards the away team a throw-in.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Jeremie Pignard.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Important block from the Metz defence as Jonathan Bamba fires in a strike for Lille.
Jonathan Bamba for Lille drives towards goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Luiz Araujo of Lille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Metz at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Jeremie Pignard signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Metz's half?
Throw-in Metz.
That's full-time at Stade Pierre Mauroy. The final score is 1-0.
Pape Ndiaga Yade is replacing Victorien Angban for the away team.
